segments.text: What are you doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to the movies with a friend . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , did you want to go see a movie with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What movie are you going to see ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure yet . Is there something you want to see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's nothing I can think of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , did you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S2
